title: Full Stack Developer
job_details: Responsible for developing both client and server software. Requires experience with JavaScript, Node.js, and databases.

title: Graphic Designer
job_details: Create visual concepts to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, or captivate consumers. Requires proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Front-End Developer
job_details: Develop the user-facing side of web applications. Requires expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React.

title: Back-End Developer
job_details: Focus on server-side logic, database management, and integration of front-end elements. Requires knowledge of server-side languages like Python, Ruby, or PHP.

title: MERN Developer
job_details: Develop web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Requires full-stack development skills.

title: Software Developer (QA)
job_details: Ensure the quality of software through automated and manual testing. Requires experience with testing frameworks and tools.

title: UX/UI Designer
job_details: Design and enhance user experiences and interfaces for web and mobile applications. Requires strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI design skills.

title: Network Engineer
job_details: Manage and maintain computer networks. Requires knowledge of network protocols, configurations, and security.

title: Systems Engineer
job_details: Design, implement, and maintain IT infrastructure. Requires experience with system administration and network configuration.

title: Sales Associate
job_details: Handle sales inquiries and customer service remotely. Requires excellent communication and sales skills.

title: Content Writer
job_details: Create and manage content for websites and blogs. Requires strong writing and research skills.

title: Back-End Developer
job_details: Develop server-side logic and database management. Requires experience with server-side languages and frameworks.

title: Social Media Manager
job_details: Manage and create content for social media platforms. Requires knowledge of social media strategies and analytics.

title: Graphic Designer
job_details: Design visuals for digital and print media. Requires proficiency in design software like Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Web Content Editor
job_details: Edit and manage web content. Requires strong editorial skills and familiarity with content management systems.

title: MERN Developer
job_details: Develop web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Requires full-stack development skills.

title: Software Developer (QA)
job_details: Ensure the quality of software through automated and manual testing. Requires experience with testing frameworks and tools.

title: Data Analyst
job_details: Analyze data and provide insights to support business decisions. Requires proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques.

title: Sales Manager (Hybrid)
job_details: Manage sales teams and develop strategies to achieve sales targets. Requires experience in sales management.

title: Content Writer
job_details: Write and edit content for various platforms. Requires strong writing skills and attention to detail.

title: Product Manager
job_details: Oversee product development from ideation to launch. Requires experience in product management and strategic planning.

title: UI/UX Designer
job_details: Design and enhance user experiences and interfaces for web and mobile applications. Requires strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI design skills.

title: Technical Support Engineer
job_details: Provide technical support to customers and resolve issues. Requires strong problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.

title: Marketing Specialist
job_details: Develop and implement marketing campaigns. Requires experience with digital marketing tools and strategies.
